news.title: Nick Cave, No Longer So Angry About AI, Shares New “Tupelo” Video Starring an AI Elvis: Watch
news.summary: On the Bad Seeds classic’s 40th anniversary, the director Andrew Dominik has persuaded his longtime collaborator that not all artificial intelligence is “a grotesque mockery of what it is to be human”

news.title: Thundercat Announces Fall North American Tour
news.summary: The singer-bassist will also soon perform at Outside Lands and more

news.title: Emma Stone Stars With Jerskin Fendrix in New Video Directed by Yorgos Lanthimos: Watch
news.summary: The trio’s ongoing collaboration continues with the short film for “Beth’s Farm,” from Fendrix’s new album, Once Upon a Time… in Shropshire

news.title: Nourished by Time Shares Video for New Song “Baby Baby”: Watch
news.summary: The third single from The Passionate Ones comes with a self-directed video shot at New Jersey’s American Dream entertainment complex

news.title: Silvana Estrada Announces New Album Vendrán Suaves Lluvias, Shares New Song “Dime”: Listen
news.summary: The Mexican singer-songwriter returns in October with her first LP since 2022

news.title: Animal Collective Share New Song “Buddies on the Blackboard”: Listen
news.summary: The B-side to “Love on the Big Screen”

news.title: Snõõper Announce New Album Worldwide, Share Video for New Song: Watch
news.summary: The Nashville egg-punk band returns with its second LP for Third Man Records

news.title: Devendra Banhart Announces New Cripple Crow Reissue, Shares Demo: Listen
news.summary: The deluxe edition of the indie musician’s 2005 album includes demos, live recordings, and more

news.title: The Smile’s Tom Skinner Announces New Album Kaleidoscopic Visions, Shares Song: Listen
news.summary: The drummer and composer’s first studio album since 2022 features Portishead’s Adrian Utley, Meshell Ndegeocello, and others
